definition: angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Octagon —shapedturrets rest on the four corners of the wall.
sentences.chinese: 八角形塔樓其餘的四個角落的牆上。

sentences.english: It was octagonal-shaped, thin, and the top was a carved design of two snakes.
sentences.chinese: 這是八角形，薄，頂部是一個雕刻設計的兩蛇。

sentences.english: Litho-printed octagon icon stripe down front.
sentences.chinese: 平版印刷的八角形的圖標條紋，向下前。

sentences.english: If a circle is one, how many is an octagon ?
sentences.chinese: 如果圈子是一個，八角形物是多少？

sentences.english: Come on, let's go find an octagon.
sentences.chinese: 來吧，讓我們找一個八角形出來。

sentences.english: The old straight side of Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church built a new octagonal church.
sentences.chinese: 古老的威廉皇帝紀念教堂直側建有八角形的新教堂。

sentences.english: Tower level octagon, five stories of appearances, insert dark story of four grades, it is nine layers in fact.
sentences.chinese: 塔平面八角形，外觀五層，夾有暗層四級，實爲九層。

sentences.english: Its octagonal lighthouse is one of the most photographed spots in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 八角形的燈塔是加拿大最值得攝影留念的風景之一。

sentences.english: Octagonal-shaped crown set with blue cabochon crown.
sentences.chinese: 八角形錶冠設置藍色凸圓形樹冠。

definition: Buddhist ornamentation decorating the upper story of a pagoda
